subject: Parts Order
description_text:
Simsonn Support Team,

I want to order pieces of your

Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulator Pedal with Baseplate
Choose your pedal setup: Plus X P3-H3
Color: Silver

I need the left and right upright portions and the middle supports that the pedal plates screw into. I've attached a picture with the highlighted parts I need.

Assistance in this will be greatly appreciated.

Respectfully,
Josh Brown
